definitions.title: vb. denom. Pi.
definitions.body: make a nest, nest ;—Pf.  3 fs. [[קִנְּנׇה]] Is 34:15; 3 pl. [[קִנְנוּ]] Ez Eze 31:6 (in fig.); Impf. 3 ms. [[יְקַנֵּנ֑וּ]] Ps 104:17; 3 fs. [[תְּקַנֵּן]] Je 48:28 (sim.).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. fs. [[מקננתי]] (Ges § 901) Je 22:23 Kt (Qr [[מְקֻנַּנְתְּ]]; cf. Ges:§ 80 d) (thou) who art nested in the cedars (fig.).
